Motivation

In May 2018 , after several months of talking, consultations and advising from a couple of my close IT friends I decided to quit and resign at that time my current job and enter the world of web development. Since then I am learning highly motivated almost every day to acquire interdisciplinary knowledge that connects law and the IT sector. I even didn't go to the seaside holiday that year in order to save up some extra time and finances for the learning period in the future, and it's already paying off.
